mapper.select: SELECT id, username, password, nickname, email, phone, avatar, gender, dept_id, user_type, status, login_time, create_time, update_time, create_by, update_by, deleted FROM sys_user WHERE username = #{username} AND deleted = 0
SELECT r.role_key FROM sys_role r INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON r.id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND r.status = 1 AND r.deleted = 0

SELECT DISTINCT p.permission_key FROM sys_permission p INNER JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rp.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND p.status = 1 AND p.deleted = 0

SELECT DISTINCT m.menu_key FROM sys_menu m INNER JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rm.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND m.status = 1 AND m.deleted = 0 ORDER BY m.order_num

SELECT id, username, password, nickname, email, phone, avatar, gender, dept_id, user_type, status, login_time, create_time, update_time, create_by, update_by, deleted FROM sys_user WHERE dept_id = #{deptId} AND deleted = 0 ORDER BY create_time DESC

SELECT u.id, u.username, u.password, u.nickname, u.email, u.phone, u.avatar, u.gender, u.dept_id, u.user_type, u.status, u.login_time, u.create_time, u.update_time, u.create_by, u.update_by, u.deleted FROM sys_user u INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id WHERE ur.role_id = #{roleId} AND u.deleted = 0 ORDER BY u.create_time DESC
